column1: Local Foods////One of my favorite restaurants in the village. Great atmosphere
column3: and although they're a little pricey compared to other sandwich and soup spots (I usually pay around $12 for a sandwich and 2 sides)
column4: you're paying for quality food. I highly recommend the Crunchy Chicken and the Vietnamese Banh Mi (on those heavenly pretzel buns)
column5: and pretty much all of the sides (except the miso tofu slaw- maybe it just wasn't what I expected
column6: but it was incredibly pungent and bitter). Be sure to check out the soup of the season as well. Yummy desserts
